title: Enhance GetReadyWork to return mission context
description: Modify GetReadyWork() query to include mission context for each ready task. This allows the executor to know which mission a task belongs to and scope work accordingly.
design:
Approach:
1. Extend WorkFilter to support mission-scoped queries
2. For each ready task, call GetMissionForTask() to get mission context
3. Return tasks with mission metadata attached
4. Support filtering by active missions (no needs-quality-gates label)

Alternative: Add GetReadyWorkWithMissionContext() method that returns enriched results
acceptance_criteria:
- GetReadyWork() returns mission context for each task
- Executor can filter by active mission status
- Query excludes tasks from missions with needs-quality-gates label
- Performance: mission context fetched efficiently (not N+1 queries)
- Unit tests verify mission context returned
- Integration tests verify executor uses mission context
